name: Punch VR for the Vive
description:
- Destroy spheres that fly towards you using fists and elbows,

- Punch bad guys in the face,

- Try and get as many points and consecutive hits as possible before your health runs out.

- Listen to a selection of 18 songs via a jukebox.

This is my first try at making a game and it is very basic however it is also quite fun and a good workout.
